channel.title: Client run.bat redirect
channel.description:
@echo off title Client cd bin java -Xmx1000m client 10 0 highmem 32 pause
error
Error loading: C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\msvcr71.dll Starting up SoundSystem... Initializing No Sound (Silent Mode) RS2 user client - release #317 java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat (Het systeem kan het opgegeven pad niet vinden) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:65) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
how do i fix this

item.title: Client run.bat redirect
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Wank, post:9, topic:445826”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=548684.msg4022178#msg4022178 date=1340086527]

Other files.

Are you fucking retarded[quote author=Mario PvP link=topic=548684.msg4022148#msg4022148 date=1340083333]
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat

Your cache is likely in the wrong directory. Based on the file string provided, the cache folder must be in the same directory as your client.class file

Depends, or are you? Implying I am ‘fucking retarded’ when you clearly do not know me. I don’t appreciate assumptions like that, as I am in the learning process as well so keep your conceited arrogant comments to yourself. And quite frankly, the above question is self explanatory as it clearly states the cache file is missing.
[/quote]

this is what we call being ignorant
[/quote]

Or being arrogant or conceited[/quote]
I’m not being arrogant or conceited by calling you retarded. You completely ignored the exact file location that was printed, including the file name. Your failure to look at the obvious is your own damn fault

Read full topic

item.title: Client run.bat redirect
item.dc:creator: @Wank Broham
item.description:
@Wank wrote:

My best guess would be your client didn’t come with the file, or your client during the cache download and extraction process didn’t extract it to the specified directory.

Read full topic
